extendedInfo.description: cCall is a smart and powerful mobile phone application that will help you save on your IDD calls. It will reduce your phone bills significantly whether you are in your home country or you are travelling overseas. Besides the benefits of major cost savings, calls you made from cCall are connected with premium voice quality. With its unique design and ease of use, frequent travellers do not have to worry about IDD call and International SMS roaming charges. The cCall system stores all your predefined overseas prepaid SIM card numbers for easy reference.
